quote: You're not going to wake up one day and feel like today is a great day to drop 500 grand.
why_clipworthy: It addresses the emotional aspect of buying a home, which is relatable to many buyers.
suggested_hook: Ever feel anxious about making a big purchase? You're not alone.

quote: You get what you put in. Sometimes that might take a year or two years, but if you truly are dedicated, it will work out.
why_clipworthy: Encourages new agents to stay committed and patient.
suggested_hook: Wondering if your hard work in real estate will pay off?
